name: 催眠スクールデイズ - Hypnotic School Days
name_original: 催眠スクールデイズ - Hypnotic School Days
description:
"Hypnotic School Days" is a novel game in which a lame protagonist uses a hypnosis app he acquires to rapidly get close to the heroines.
A Bishojo Game released in 2018 under the "Noirsoft" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players of all ages worldwide to enjoy.



◆Introduction
"Don't remember installing this app..."
An app that was suddenly installed on the smartphone.
It was an app that can hypnotize any girl listed in the app!


◆Synopsis
The protagonist, Kyoichi Hata is a lame male highschool student.
As usual, he was killing time with some free apps on his phone.
There, he noticed an installed app he was not familiar with.

"Hypnosis App"

Although he thought it was ridiculous at first,
he discovers it's a "legitimate" app that can hypnotize others by showing them the screen.

It was an extreme stimulation that came to his ordinary life.
That stimulation begins to change Kyoichi's boring school life....



◆Characters
・Yuna Kashiwagi
"Why are you so nervous?"

A pure looking girl with long black hair, she is in the same class as Kyoichi.
She is popular amongst both men and women, and someone who Kyoichi has a crush on her.
She is smart but not very good at sports.
When it comes to romance, she is the timid type who cannot make a move without an opportunity.


・Izumi Nakakaze
"Are you ignoring me, senpai? Pay attention to your cute junior a little!"

A junior gal with affection towards Kyoichi.
Despite her flashy looks, she is surprisingly smart and good at housework.
She is a gal with a strong will to enjoy life, without being swept by the influence of others.
Being full of curiosity, she is willing and eager to be hynoptized.


・Akari Shinozaki
"D... Don't call me cute... I'm your senpai"

A genius girl who is smart enough to skip a grade. She is one grade above Kyoichi, but a year younger.
She is quite a picky eater and has an extreme craving for sweet foods.
From her complex about having a petite and childish appearance,
she tends to wear mature clothes and listen to complex music.
Perhaps from her intelligence, she looks for solid proof in romantic feeling.


・Kyoichi Hata
A male student, always on his phone whenever he has time.
Although he has as much self-control as anyone, he was drawn in by the lure of the hypnosis app.
